name: Speed and Scream
description: High-adrenaline experiences collection for virtual reality, ride a rollercoaster on the moon, visit the realm of the dead or places that can't exist in our world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3-4160 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4500 MB available space
